languages.text: "Гнида. Я теперь новый символ для его лживых бредней — храбрый сержант, сбежавший из ксеносского плена. Новобранцы смотрят разинув рты, ловят каждое слово, а я лишь зубы стиснуть могу и думать о том сколько он уже таких как они... как мы... на убой отправил. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}Висеть на кольях{/d} — ничто по сравнению с этой пыткой".

traits.locale_text: "Гнида. Я теперь новый символ для его лживых бредней — храбрый сержант, сбежавший из ксеносского плена. Новобранцы смотрят разинув рты, ловят каждое слово, а я лишь зубы стиснуть могу и думать о том сколько он уже таких как они... как мы... на убой отправил. Висеть на кольях — ничто по сравнению с этой пыткой".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."
languages.original_text: "Гнида. Я теперь новый символ для его лживых бредней — храбрый сержант, сбежавший из ксеносского плена. Новобранцы смотрят разинув рты, ловят каждое слово, а я лишь зубы стиснуть могу и думать о том сколько он уже таких как они... как мы... на убой отправил. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}Висеть на кольях{/d} — ничто по сравнению с этой пыткой".

traits.locale_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped from the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, buying his every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and got sent to the slaughter. I will take being impaled on stakes over this torture any day."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped from the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, buying his every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and got sent to the slaughter. I will take being impaled on stakes over this torture any day."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped from the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, buying his every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up tortured. I will take being impaled on stakes over this torture any day."

The new guys stand there gawking, buying his every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up tortured. I will take being impaled on stakes over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「あの腐った野郎め。彼は今、見せかけの物語の新しいシンボル、つまり異種族の手から逃れた勇敢な軍曹として、私を利用しているのです。新入りの男たちは、彼の言葉を鵜呑みにして、その場に立ち尽くしています。私にできることといえば…歯を食いしばり、彼らや…我々と…同じようなことをして拷問を受けた者たちがどれだけいるのかを考えることだけだ。こんな拷問より、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}杭に突き刺される{/d}方がマシだ」
languages.original_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: 「あの腐った野郎め。彼は今、見せかけの物語の新しいシンボル、つまり異種族の手から逃れた勇敢な軍曹として、私を利用しているのです。新入りの男たちは、彼の言葉を鵜呑みにして、その場に立ち尽くしています。私にできることといえば…歯を食いしばり、彼らや…我々と…同じようなことをして拷問を受けた者たちがどれだけいるのかを考えることだけだ。こんな拷問より、杭に突き刺される方がマシだ」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “那个该死的叛徒，他把我当成了新的宣传材料——从异形手中逃脱的勇敢军士。新来的那些家伙就在那里傻乎乎地听着，相信他所说的每一句话，而我只能咬紧牙关，想着有多少人和他们一样……和我们一样……相信了同样的事情，结果落到了异形手里，惨遭屠杀。我宁可被{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}活活钉在木桩上{/d}，也不想再忍受那样的折磨。”
languages.original_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: “那个该死的叛徒，他把我当成了新的宣传材料——从异形手中逃脱的勇敢军士。新来的那些家伙就在那里傻乎乎地听着，相信他所说的每一句话，而我只能咬紧牙关，想着有多少人和他们一样……和我们一样……相信了同样的事情，结果落到了异形手里，惨遭折磨。我宁可被活活钉死在木桩上，也不想再忍受那样的折磨。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Ese maldito canalla. Ahora me utiliza como nuevo símbolo para sus farsas: un valiente sargento que escapó de las garras de los xenos. Los nuevos se quedan boquiabiertos, tragándose cada una de sus patrañas, y lo único que puedo hacer es apretar los dientes y pensar en cuánta gente como ellos... como nosotros... hizo lo mismo y acabó despedazada. Prefiero que me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}empalen en estacas{/d} a esta tortura».
languages.original_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: «Ese maldito canalla. Ahora me utiliza como nuevo símbolo para sus farsas: un valiente sargento que escapó de las garras de los xenos. Los nuevos se quedan boquiabiertos, creyendo cada una de sus palabras, y lo único que puedo hacer es apretar los dientes y pensar en cuánta gente como ellos... como nosotros... hizo lo mismo y acabó torturada. Prefiero que me empalen en estacas a esta tortura».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Dieses verfluchte Arschloch. Jetzt setzt er mich als ein neues Symbol für seine Lügenmärchen ein — ein mutiger Sergeant, der den Klauen der Xenos entwischt ist. Die Neuen stehen mit offenem Mund da, kaufen ihm jedes Wort ab, und ich kann nur die Zähne zusammenbeißen und daran denken, wie viele Leute wie sie ... wie wir ... dasselbe getan haben und abgeschlachtet wurden. Ich lasse mich lieber {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}pfählen{/d}, als diese Folter zu erleben."
languages.original_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses verfluchte Arschloch. Jetzt setzt er mich als ein neues Symbol für seine Lügenmärchen ein — ein mutiger Sergeant, der den Klauen der Xenos entwischt ist. Die neuen stehen mit offenem Mund da, kaufen ihm jedes Wort ab, und ich kann nur die Zähne zusammenbeißen und daran denken, wie viele Leute wie sie ... wie wir ... dasselbe getan haben und gefoltert wurden. Ich lasse mich lieber pfählen, als diese Folter zu erleben."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Quelle crapule sans foi ni loi... Dire que maintenant, il se sert de moi comme d'un symbole pour ses boniments, moi, le brave sergent qui a échappé aux griffes des xénos. Les nouveaux avalent ses sornettes comme du petit lait, et tout ce que je peux faire, c'est serrer les dents et penser à tous ceux qui comme eux... comme nous... ont cru ses histoires et ont fini par être trucidés. Je préférerais qu'on {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}m'empale sur des pics{/d} plutôt que de subir ce qu'ils ont subi. »
languages.original_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle crapule sans foi ni loi... Dire que maintenant, il se sert de moi comme d'un symbole pour ses boniments, moi, le brave sergent qui a échappé aux griffes des xénos. Les nouveaux avalent ses sornettes comme du petit lait, et tout ce que je peux faire, c'est serrer les dents et penser à tous ceux qui comme eux... comme nous... ont cru ses histoires et ont fini par être torturés. Je préférerais qu'on m'empale sur des pics plutôt que de subir ce qu'ils ont subi. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "O ciğeri peş para etmez alçak... Şimdi de beni sahtekâr hikâyelerinin yeni sembolü olarak kullanıyor. Zenolarların pençelerinden kurtulan cesur çavuş... Yeni gelenler, köşede durup bön bön bakıyorlar. Duydukları her şeye inanıyorlar. Benim tek yapabildiğimse dişlerimi sıkıp onlar gibi... Bizim gibi... Nicelerinin aynı yoldan yürüyüp canından olduğunu düşünmek. Bu işkencedense her gün {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}kazığa oturtulmayı{/d} yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "That bloody rotter. Now he's using me as a new symbol for his sham tales — a brave sergeant who escaped the xenos' clutches. The new guys stand there gawking, eating up every word, and all I can do is grit my teeth and think about how many people just like them... just like us... did the same and wound up butchered. I'll take {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}being impaled on stakes{/d} over this torture any day."

traits.locale_text: "O ciğeri peş para etmez alçak... Şimdi de beni sahtekâr hikâyelerinin yeni sembolü olarak kullanıyor. Zenolarların pençelerinden kurtulan cesur çavuş... Yeni gelenler, köşede durup bön bön bakıyorlar. Duydukları her şeye inanıyorlar. Benim tek yapabildiğimse dişlerimi sıkıp onlar gibi... Bizim gibi... Nicelerinin aynı yoldan yürüyüp canından olduğunu düşünmek. Bu işkencedense her gün {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}kazığa oturtulmayı{/d} yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
